mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_REPLY VALUES ( SEQ_BRNO.NEXTVAL, #{refBno}, #{replyWriter}, #{replyContent}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_NO replyNo, REF_BNO refBno, M.NICKNAME replyWriter, REPLY_CONTENT replyContent, CREATE_DATE createDate FROM TB_REPLY JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON (REPLY_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE REF_BNO = {refBno} ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
